outputs.output_descr: With the support of relevant partners, including the UN ODA, other States Parties to the CCM and the civil society organization CMC/ICBL, ensure the successful implementation of the Beirut 2MSP  and support Lebanon in its President role .

project_descr: Support to the second meeting of state parties on the Convention for Cluster Munitions in Lebanon
project_title: Support to the Convention for Cluster Munitions
